mil.nga.geopackage.extension.link

Class FeatureTileTableCoreLinker

  • java.lang.Object
    • mil.nga.geopackage.extension.BaseExtension
      • mil.nga.geopackage.extension.link.FeatureTileTableCoreLinker

  • public abstract class FeatureTileTableCoreLinker
extends BaseExtension
    Abstract Feature Tile Table linker, used to link feature and tile tables together when the tiles represent the feature data
    Since:
    1.1.6
    Author:
    osbornb
